main_features.description: Manage PostgreSQL database through a lightweight web interface.
Automatically scrape convocation data from EU's funding opportunities portal.
Monitor the system status, scraping statistics, and analysis results with a responsive UI.

technical_stack.description: Asynchronous HTTP client/server framework for web scraping.
Library for parsing HTML and XML documents.

priority_order: Web Scraping Engine for Convocation Data

missing_imports.action: Import ForeignKey from sqlalchemy.orm at the top of the models.py file.
